name: Acorns & Asteroids
description:
Written in Java using Eclipse & Slick2D. Source code & assets:

https://github.com/mccabe93/Weekly-One-Hour-Gameja...

wasd to move

lmb to shoot

It says hit R to restart but I ran out of time and that doesn't work. There's also no victory screen or anything! Next week I'll add those elements!
